settings.name: game_version
settings.description: Select Red or Blue version.

settings.name: trainer_name
settings.description: Your trainer's name. Cannot exceed 7 characters. See the [setup guide on archipelago.gg](https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Pokemon%20Red%20and%20Blue/setup/en) for a list of allowed characters.

values.name: ASH
values.readableName: ASH (edit your YAML manually if you want a different name)

settings.name: rival_name
settings.description: Your rival's name. Cannot exceed 7 characters. See the [setup guide on archipelago.gg](https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Pokemon%20Red%20and%20Blue/setup/en) for a list of allowed characters.

values.name: GARY
values.readableName: GARY (edit your YAML manually if you want a different name)

settings.name: elite_four_condition
settings.description: Number of badges required to challenge the Elite Four once the Indigo Plateau has been reached. Your rival will reveal the amount needed on the first Route 22 battle (after turning in Oak's Parcel).

settings.name: victory_road_condition
settings.description: Number of badges required to reach Victory Road.

settings.name: viridian_gym_condition
settings.description: Number of badges required to enter Viridian Gym.

settings.name: cerulean_cave_condition
settings.description: Number of badges, HMs, and key items (not counting items you can lose) required to access Cerulean Cave.

settings.name: second_fossil_check_condition
settings.description: After choosing one of the fossil location items, you can obtain the remaining item from the Cinnabar Lab Scientist after reviving this number of fossils.

settings.name: badgesanity
settings.description: Shuffle gym badges into the general item pool. If turned off, badges will be shuffled across the 8 gyms.

settings.name: old_man
settings.description: With Open Viridian City, the Old Man will let you through without needing to turn in Oak's Parcel.

settings.name: tea
settings.description: Adds a Tea item to the item pool which the Saffron guards require instead of the vending machine drinks. Adds a location check to the Celadon Mansion 1F, where Tea is acquired in FireRed and LeafGreen.

settings.name: extra_key_items
settings.description: Adds key items that are required to access the Rocket Hideout, Cinnabar Mansion, Safari Zone, and Power Plant. Adds four item pickups to Rock Tunnel B1F.

settings.name: extra_strength_boulders
settings.description: Adds Strength Boulders blocking the Route 11 gate, and in Route 13 (can be bypassed with Surf). This potentially increases the usefulness of Strength as well as the Bicycle.

settings.name: require_item_finder
settings.description: Require Item Finder to pick up hidden items.

settings.name: randomize_hidden_items
settings.description: Randomize hidden items. If you choose exclude, they will be randomized but will be guaranteed junk items.

values.name: exclude
values.description: Hidden items will always be junk.

settings.name: badges_needed_for_hm_moves
settings.description: Determines whether badges are required for HM moves.

values.name: on
values.description: Badges are required for HMs as vanilla.

values.name: off
values.description: Removes the requirement for badges to use HM moves.

values.name: extra
values.description: Gives the Marsh, Volcano, and Earth Badges a random HM move to enable.

values.name: extra_plus
values.description: Gives the Marsh, Volcano, and Earth Badges a random HM move to enable, AND picks two random badges to enable a second HM move. You will only need one of the required badges to use the HM move.

settings.name: free_fly_location
settings.description: One random fly destination will be unlocked by default.

settings.name: oaks_aide_rt_2
settings.description: Number of Pokémon registered in the Pokedex required to receive the item from Oak's Aide on Route 2. *(Vanilla is 10)*

settings.name: oaks_aide_rt_11
settings.description: Number of Pokémon registered in the Pokedex required to receive the item from Oak's Aide on Route 11. *(Vanilla is 30)*

settings.name: oaks_aide_rt_15
settings.description: Number of Pokémon registered in the Pokedex required to receive the item from Oak's Aide on Route 15. *(Vanilla is 50)*

settings.name: blind_trainers
settings.description: Chance each frame that you are standing on a tile in a trainer's line of sight that they will fail to initiate a battle. If you move into and out of their line of sight without stopping, this chance will only trigger once.

settings.name: minimum_steps_between_encounters
settings.description: Minimum number of steps between wild Pokémon encounters.

settings.name: exp_modifier
settings.description: Modifier for EXP gained. When specifying a number, experience is multiplied by this amount and divided by 16.

settings.name: randomize_wild_pokemon
settings.description: Randomize all wild Pokemon and game corner prize Pokémon.

values.name: match_types
values.description: Select a Pokemon with at least one type matching the original type of the original Pokémon.

values.name: match_base_stats
values.description: Prefer Pokémon with closer base stat totals.

values.name: match_types_and_base_stats
values.description: Matches types and will weight towards similar base stats, but there may not be many to choose from.

settings.name: randomize_starter_pokemon
settings.description: Randomize the starter Pokemon choices.

values.name: match_types
values.description: Select a Pokemon with at least one type matching the original type of the original Pokémon.

values.name: match_base_stats
values.description: Prefer Pokémon with closer base stat totals.

values.name: match_types_and_base_stats
values.description: Matches types and will weight towards similar base stats, but there may not be many to choose from.

settings.name: randomize_static_pokemon
settings.description: Randomize one-time gift and encountered Pokémon. These will always be first evolution stage Pokémon.

values.name: match_types
values.description: Select a Pokemon with at least one type matching the original type of the original Pokémon.

values.name: match_base_stats
values.description: Prefer Pokémon with closer base stat totals.

values.name: match_types_and_base_stats
values.description: Matches types and will weight towards similar base stats, but there may not be many to choose from.

settings.name: randomize_legendary_pokemon
settings.description: Randomize Legendaries. Mew has been added as an encounter at the Vermillion dock truck.

values.name: shuffle
values.description: Shuffle the legendaries with each other.

values.name: static
values.description: Shuffle Legendaries into other static Pokémon locations.

values.name: any
values.description: Allow legendaries to appear anywhere based on wild and static randomization options, and their locations will be randomized according to static Pokémon randomization options.

settings.name: catch_em_all
settings.description: Guarantee all first evolution stage Pokémon are available, or all Pokémon of all stages. Currently only has an effect if wild Pokémon are randomized.

settings.name: randomize_pokemon_stats
settings.description: Randomize base stats for each Pokémon.

values.name: shuffle
values.description: Shuffle the 5 base stat values amongst each other.

values.name: randomize
values.description: Completely randomize each stat, but will still add up to the same base stat total.

settings.name: randomize_pokemon_catch_rates
settings.description: Randomize the catch rate for each Pokémon.

settings.name: minimum_catch_rate
settings.description: Minimum catch rate for each Pokémon. If "Randomize catch rates" is on, this will be the minimum value that can be chosen. Otherwise, it will raise any Pokémon's catch rate up to this value if its normal catch rate is lower.

settings.name: randomize_trainer_parties
settings.description: Randomize enemy Pokémon encountered in trainer battles.

values.name: match_types
values.description: Select a Pokemon with at least one type matching the original type of the original Pokémon.

values.name: match_base_stats
values.description: Prefer Pokémon with closer base stat totals.

values.name: match_types_and_base_stats
values.description: Matches types and will weight towards similar base stats, but there may not be many to choose from.

settings.name: trainer_legendaries
settings.description: Allow Legendary Pokémon in randomized trainer parties.

settings.name: randomize_pokemon_movesets
settings.description: Randomize the moves learned by Pokemon.

values.name: prefer_types
values.description: Prefer moves that match the type of the Pokemon.

settings.name: start_with_four_moves
settings.description: If movesets are randomized, this will give all Pokémon 4 starting moves.

settings.name: tm_compatibility
settings.description: Randomize which Pokémon can learn each TM.

values.name: prefer_types
values.description: 90% chance if Pokemon's type matches the move, 50% chance if move is Normal type and the Pokemon is not, and 25% chance otherwise. Pokemon will retain the same TM compatibility when they evolve if the evolved form has the same type(s). Mew will always be able to learn every TM.

settings.name: hm_compatibility
settings.description: Randomize which Pokemon can learn each HM.

values.name: prefer_types
values.description: 100% chance if Pokemon's type matches the move, 75% chance if move is Normal type and the Pokemon is not, and 25% chance otherwise. Pokemon will retain the same HM compatibility when they evolve if the evolved form has the same type(s). Mew will always be able to learn every HM.

settings.name: randomize_pokemon_types
settings.description: Randomize the types of each Pokémon.

values.name: follow_evolutions
values.description: Ensure Pokémon's types remain the same when evolving (except possibly gaining a type).

settings.name: secondary_type_chance
settings.description: If "Randomize Pokémon types" is on, this is the chance each Pokemon will have a secondary type. If "Follow evolutions" is selected, it is the chance a second type will be added at each evolution stage. Vanilla (-1) will give secondary types to Pokémon that normally have a secondary type.

settings.name: randomize_type_matchup_types
settings.description: The game's type chart consists of 3 columns: attacking type, defending type, and type effectiveness. Matchups that have regular type effectiveness are not in the chart.

values.name: shuffle
values.description: Shuffle the attacking types across the attacking type column and the defending types across the defending type column (so for example Normal type will still have exactly 2 types that it receives non-regular damage from, and 2 types it deals non-regular damage to).

values.name: randomize
values.description: Randomize each type in both columns to any random type.

settings.name: randomize_type_matchup_type_effectiveness
settings.description: The game's type chart consists of 3 columns: attacking type, defending type, and type effectiveness. Matchups that have regular type effectiveness are not in the chart.

values.name: shuffle
values.description: Shuffle the type effectiveness across the type effectiveness column (so for example there will always be 6 type immunities).

values.name: randomize
values.description: Randomize each entry in the table to no effect, not very effective, or super effective; with no effect occurring at a low chance.

values.name: chaos
values.description: Randomize the values to anywhere between 0% and 200% damage, in 10% increments.

settings.name: safari_zone_normal_battles
settings.description: Change the Safari Zone to have standard wild Pokémon battles.

settings.name: normalize_encounter_chances
settings.description: Each wild encounter table has 10 slots for Pokémon. Normally the chance for each being chosen ranges from 19.9% to 1.2%. Turn this on to normalize them all to 10% each.

settings.name: reusable_tms
settings.description: Makes TMs reusable, so they will not be consumed upon use.

settings.name: starting_money
settings.description: The amount of money you start with.
